Html:
Whenever I optimize my Arms warrior, I have no problems. lets me set how much ArP I want, I can tell it not to let me miss yellow attacks, etc. But I have yet to find another class that it will give me those options on. is there a reason for this?

 

Sorry if this has already been answered, just wanted to throw it out there real fast
This is because the different modules are done by different people.  If you'd like a certain feature added, I'm sure they're willing to take suggestions. :)
I just looked at a couple other threads, and it seems I may just not know how to read some of the options that are already built in >.<
